## JsonRpcProvider.syncCheckBad() method

checks if a block was marked as bad, and if it was, returns the reason.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
syncCheckBad(blockCid: Cid): Promise<string>;
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  blockCid | Cid |  |
